blurb1: ChefLyfe is a platform for chefs and foodservice employees that automates food cost calculation. Easily add menus, recipes, and ingredients with our intuitive interface, CSV uploads, and USDA searches. Add people to your brigade to share menus and recipes with them, and share interesting news and posts to your feed.
blurb2:
Use ChefLyfe easy automated features for menus and recipes, such as
  • Sharing and importing among your brigade
  • Automatic nutrition panel generation
  • Shopping lists
  • Profit & food cost calculations
